branch.title: Please visit us at a branch
branch.detail: Have any questions? Call us or visit the nearest branch.
branch.callUs:
Call us
on the info line

updateApp.title: Update your application
updateApp.detail:
In order for everything to work as it should, Smart Banka version 73.3 and later must be on both devices.

Or stop by us at any of our branches, where we will pair your devices.
updateApp.callUs:
Call us
on the info line

intro.title: We will now verify your identity in two steps

bullets.title: Take a photo of both sides of your ID card
bullets.description: A valid ID card from the Czech Republic will be needed.

bullets.title: Identity verification
bullets.description: In the final step, we will verify that it is really you and that no one is impersonating you.

intro.primaryButton: Take a photo of the ID card

info.idFrontTitle: Now take a photo of the front side of your ID card
info.idBackTitle: Now take a photo of the back side of your ID card
info.drivingLicenceTitle: Now take a photo of the front side of your driver's license
info.passportLicenceTitle: Now take a photo of the front side of your passport

bullets.title: A valid document from the correct side, in landscape orientation
In good lighting, sharply, without blur or glare

takePhoto.idFrontTitle: Front side of the ID card
takePhoto.idBackTitle: Back side of the ID card
takePhoto.drivingLicenceTitle: Front side of the driver's license

upload.title: Processing the photographed document, it will be done shortly

wrongDocument.title: Failed to read the data from your document. Please take the photo again
wrongDocument.detail: Make sure you are photographing the correct document (Czech), that it is fully in the frame and the information is not blurry.

scanFailed.title: We couldn’t read your data correctly
scanFailed.detail: Please check and complete it in the next step.

permissionErrorScreen.title: The app requires permissions
permissionErrorScreen.detail:
To take photos of your documents for identity verification, allow the Smart Bank to access the camera in settings.

Don’t want to photograph your documents? Bring them to a branch.

liveness.title: In the last step, we will verify you using a short video

bullets.title: We will now record a short video of your face.
bullets.detail: So we can be sure that no one is impersonating you.

bullets.title: Using simple gestures (turning your head left, right, and smiling), we will ensure maximum certainty.
Your privacy and security are most important to us - the recording will only be used for identity verification.

error.title: We apologize, an unexpected error occurred while sending the video

liveness.demo: Watch a demo to see what to expect
liveness.faceInCenter: Do you have good lighting and is your face centered?
liveness.turnBack: Great! Now turn your head to the side and back:

livenessVerification.title:
Oscar-worthy performance! Thank you.
Processing the video. Please don’t close the app
livenessVerification.detail: The recorded video will be compared with your documents to ensure it’s you.

clientSigned.title: Welcome back to Moneta, everything is ready!

victory.title: Welcome back to Moneta, everything is ready!
victory.detail: Log in to confirm the activation of Smart Bank.
